description: Enable and/or change default settings for 'local-path-provisioner' plugin

storage-class.description: Configuration of StorageClass resource for Local Path Provisioner

name.description: Name of the storage class resource, which describes the class of the local volumes created by the provisioner

is-default.description: If 'true', the created storage class is the default one

volume-dir.description: The directory on each node, where the provisioner stores the PV data. For each requested PV, the provisioner creates the subdirectory in the volume-dir.
